name: Next One Data Consulting
tagline: Big Data Analytics and Software Development Consulting
body:
### Next One Data
Moving your business into the BIG DATA era?  Next One Data provides businesses with professional big data development experience in conjunction with real-world analytics experience in a variety of industries.  

### Industry Experience
The engineering team at Next One Data has over 20 years of experience in a variety of industries.  Medical, financial, broadcast and professional sports are just a few of the area that our engineers have worked in.  Contact us to find out more!

### Data Warehouse Development and Front-end Reporting
Are you taking advantage of your data? Can your company make data-driven decisions?  Next One Data can help to create your data warehouse infrastructure and provide the framework for your front-end reporting tools.  We can help you use YOUR data to make proper business decisions.

### Support or Contact
Contact us at .......
